INTRODUCTION
As the first of the English workbook series for Vietnamese primary school pupils, Grade 1 English Workbook is compiled with the intense determination to accommodate the insistence on learning English for young pupils from the early stage. The workbook consequently acquaints pupils with not only fundamental background but also English language skills.
Grade 1 English Workbook follows a sequence of 6 key forms of tasks that are illustrated elaborately in 16 learning units, a starter unit and four review units. Following is a brief description of how a unit is organized.
TRACE ME
This activity helps pupils trace the letters (upper case and lower case) before writing the letters to complete the words using visual prompts.
VOCABULARY
This activity provides the controlled practice of the keywords that helps pupils familiarize themselves with the words before reproducing them in a broader context.
PHONICS
This activity focuses on the context in which the target sounds of the letters are introduced.
THINK IT OVER
This section provides pupils with extended activities to get familiar- ized with the new language items (structure(s) and words). Lưu hành nội bộ FUN CORNER
This section contains fun, exciting activities that encourage and guide pupils to develop further authentic contexts.
MY PROJECT
This activity helps pupils consolidate the unit's language items they have learned.
